pages.text: $(br2)$(br2)This chapter will define the powers that can be found in the Freeman section of the class tree.

$(li)$(l:the_class_tree/freeman_powers#better_carpentry)Better Carpentry$()$(li)$(l:the_class_tree/freeman_powers#bonemeal_efficiency)Bonemeal Efficiency$()$(br)$(li)$(l:the_class_tree/freeman_powers#butcher)Butcher$()$(li)$(l:the_class_tree/freeman_powers#call_to_arms)Call to Arms$()$(br)$(li)$(l:the_class_tree/freeman_powers#connections)Connections$()$(li)$(l:the_class_tree/freeman_powers#culinary_arts)Culinary Arts$()$(br)$(li)$(l:the_class_tree/freeman_powers#dark_vision)Dark Vision$()$(li)$(l:the_class_tree/freeman_powers#efficient_repairs)Efficient Repairs$()$(br)$(li)$(l:the_class_tree/freeman_powers#expert_carpentry)Expert Carpentry$()$(li)$(l:the_class_tree/freeman_powers#freemans_fortitude)Freeman's Fortitude$()

$(li)$(l:the_class_tree/freeman_powers#luck_of_the_draw)Luck of the Draw$()$(li)$(l:the_class_tree/freeman_powers#master_chef)Master Chef$()$(br)$(li)$(l:the_class_tree/freeman_powers#mining_training)Mining Training$()$(li)$(l:the_class_tree/freeman_powers#reach)Reach$()$(br)$(li)$(l:the_class_tree/freeman_powers#safe_fall)Safe Fall$()$(li)$(l:the_class_tree/freeman_powers#skilled_hands)Skilled Hands$()$(br)$(li)$(l:the_class_tree/freeman_powers#skilled_hands_ii)Skilled Hands II$()$(li)$(l:the_class_tree/freeman_powers#smelting)Smelting$()$(br)$(li)$(l:the_class_tree/freeman_powers#tools_of_the_trade)Tools of the Trade$()

pages.title: Better Carpentry
pages.text: When crafting planks you make six instead of four$(br2)$(br2)$(l:the_class_tree/freeman_powers#freeman_powerlist)RETURN TO TOP$()

pages.title: Bonemeal Efficiency
pages.text: Gain a 100% increase in bonemeal efficiency$(br2)$(br2)$(l:the_class_tree/freeman_powers#freeman_powerlist)RETURN TO TOP$()

pages.title: Butcher
pages.text: When slaying passive mobs (animals), recieve a 30% increase in loot$(br2)$(br2)$(l:the_class_tree/freeman_powers#freeman_powerlist)RETURN TO TOP$()

pages.title: Call to Arms
pages.text: You gain a passive +4 to generic armor, as well as a passive +1 to generic attack damage$(br2)$(br2)$(l:the_class_tree/freeman_powers#freeman_powerlist)RETURN TO TOP$()

pages.title: Connections
pages.text: Wandering Traders give you more rare trades$(br2)$(br2)$(l:the_class_tree/freeman_powers#freeman_powerlist)RETURN TO TOP$()

pages.title: Culinary Arts
pages.text: Food that you craft has an additional 25% saturation$(br2)$(br2)$(l:the_class_tree/freeman_powers#freeman_powerlist)RETURN TO TOP$()

pages.title: Dark Vision
pages.text: You can see slightly in the dark (50% strength night vision)$(br2)$(br2)$(l:the_class_tree/freeman_powers#freeman_powerlist)RETURN TO TOP$()

pages.title: Efficient Repairs
pages.text: When using an anvil, you require 50% less materials to repair items and repair 100% more durability when doing so$(br2)$(br2)$(l:the_class_tree/freeman_powers#freeman_powerlist)RETURN TO TOP$()

pages.title: Expert Carpentry
pages.text: You are able to create additional wooden slabs, stairs, doors, and fences$(br2)$(br2)$(l:the_class_tree/freeman_powers#freeman_powerlist)RETURN TO TOP$()

pages.title: Freeman's Fortitude
pages.text: You gain +4 health (2 hearts)$(br2)$(br2)$(l:the_class_tree/freeman_powers#freeman_powerlist)RETURN TO TOP$()

pages.title: Luck of the Draw
pages.text: You gain +1 luck$(br2)$(br2)$(l:the_class_tree/freeman_powers#freeman_powerlist)RETURN TO TOP$()

pages.title: Master Chef
pages.text: You gain 100% more experience orbs when using a smoker$(br2)$(br2)$(l:the_class_tree/freeman_powers#freeman_powerlist)RETURN TO TOP$()

pages.title: Mining Training
pages.text: You gain 943 PMMO Mining xp$(br2)$(br2)$(l:the_class_tree/freeman_powers#freeman_powerlist)RETURN TO TOP$()

pages.title: Reach
pages.text: You can reach 1 block farther$(br2)$(br2)$(l:the_class_tree/freeman_powers#freeman_powerlist)RETURN TO TOP$()

pages.title: Safe Fall
pages.text: You take half damage from falling$(br2)$(br2)$(l:the_class_tree/freeman_powers#freeman_powerlist)RETURN TO TOP$()

pages.title: Skilled Hands
pages.text: You gain 20% faster mining speed$(br2)$(br2)$(l:the_class_tree/freeman_powers#freeman_powerlist)RETURN TO TOP$()

pages.title: Skilled Hands II
pages.text: You gain 60% faster mining speed$(br2)$(br2)$(l:the_class_tree/freeman_powers#freeman_powerlist)RETURN TO TOP$()

pages.title: Smelting
pages.text: You gain 200% more experience orbs when using a blast furnace$(br2)$(br2)$(l:the_class_tree/freeman_powers#freeman_powerlist)RETURN TO TOP$()

pages.title: Tools of the Trade
pages.text: You gain +2 generic attack damage with hammers and axes$(br2)$(br2)$(l:the_class_tree/freeman_powers#freeman_powerlist)RETURN TO TOP$()
